channel.title: Visual Studio on Pietro F. Maggi
channel.description: Recent content in Visual Studio on Pietro F. Maggi

item.title: Rhodes 5.0.2 and Visual Studio 2008 Localized edition
item.author: pfm@pietromaggi.com (Pietro F. Maggi)
item.description: 2019 Update The information in this post are obsolete. Please refer to the official RhoMobile documentation for best practices and setup guide. Oh the joy of a new RhoMobile version! Creating new virtual machines and finally deciding that is time to leave the old trusty Windows XP and jump on the new Windows 7 with 63+1 bits. Oh man! what a pleasant use of time :-) On top of this I wanted to spin the setup a bit and decided to use a localized version of Visual Studio 2008… what can go wrong with it?
